metadata.title: CVE-2019-9423 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In opencv calls that use libpng, there is a possible out of bounds writedue to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges required. Userinteraction is not required for exploitation. Product: AndroidVersions:Android-10Android ID: A-110986616

criterions.comment: opencv package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-10-24').
